value:
I am but one of many divine dragons.
We will continue to exist, in one form
or another...

As dragonkind approached extinction,
we gave up our power for the sake of
the future...and not simply our own.

The world needs a guiding hand.
My role is to steady that hand.

Ritual cleansing is the best way to
prepare your body for battle. Come
now—I will show you how.

I may not be human, but...the
machinations of the children of
men still draw my interest.

The strength of your will is apparent.
I see you are indeed worthy of calling
$Nf your friend.

There exists no evil that the divine
flame cannot purify...

I do not seek out violence, but... Let
us say that even I cannot hold back
the tide.

Do not trouble yourself with doubts.
As I am now, I always have been.

Hm-hmm...very well, then. I shall see
your desires are fulfilled.

I am she who is called Naga, the
Divine Dragon. If you intend to face
your fate, prove to me your resolve.

Come here. Gaze deep into my eyes,
$Nu...$k$pYes, I see. I, too, now understand the
warmth and peace that arises when
one is at your side.$k$pIt is strange for one such as I, with
strength rival to none, who watches
over and guides the world...$k$pto drift into another world and find
myself sharing feelings with mortals
previously unknown to me.$k$pYet...these feelings have put down
roots in my heart. And your eyes tell
me you feel the same warmth.
はっ
いきます
きゃああっ！
こんな…
For the children of man!
Be warned!
Deliberation is over.
By my flame!
Such...power...
giggle
I am the Divine Dragon. So do the sons of man name me.
How strange! You are the only one whose actions I am unable to predict...
Falchion is my fang. With it, the children of man may seal dragons.
I am no god. I cannot simply grant every wish I please.
I appear before man in many forms: sometimes a great hero, sometimes a harmless child.
Children of man, take my power!

Your heart has been tested
and deemed worthy.
Yes?
What is your desire?
It will be done.
